QuestData.Title: A Little Oomph
QuestData.Description: <Dithers samples his latest concoction.>$b$bHmm... this isn't quite there. It needs something to give it a little more zing. I've got it! The spiders to the north have a potent venom that'll do the trick. See if you can extract some for me, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 4 samples of Vicious Night Web Spider Venom.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have some venom from a Vicious Night Web Spider yet, $n? It's the final component I need in order to test my experiment.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, this venom will do perfectly, $n. Everything else has been added to my concoction and boiled down. Thank you, $c!
